title: Del Molcajete Habanero Verde Salsa Clasica 12-pack
features: Del Molcajete's hand picked habanero verde peppers are organically grown and seasoned with the most natural ingredients resulting in this delicious hot sauce.
The perfect blend of condiments is sure to add a spicy kick to your taste buds and favorite dishes.
Our Del Molcajete Habanero Verde Salsa Claseica has a heat rating of 100,000 - 350,000 Scoville's.
Each bottle in this 12-pack is 9.17 fl oz
